title: Ocean Week diorama and art contest!

replies.body: That heartbreaking moment when you see "10,000 RP" then see the word "draw" {{item:3070}}
You don't need to be able to draw to make a diorama! Just saying.
see any amount or prizes, but requires you to be artistic, many sadness
Ikr, we need a League Talent Contest.

I wish I could enter.. Too bad when I'm trying to draw a person in turns out looking like an ogre... :/
{{champion:48}} ?
May I submit more than one entry? Perhaps two paintings or two ideas?
You sure can!
OMG its riot actually answering :O riot can u make this entry more longer
So hope so
Damn. I would enter... But my drawing is terrible.

Can submit more than one drawing?

I have an idea for{{champion:62}} which can end up in two drawings

also is there a limit on how many champions can be in the same drawing?
You can submit more than one entry, and your submission can have as many champions as you want!
(faint)

I and a number of other people have discovered that your Facebook app only has the Diorama category, despite submissions for the fanart contest still being open for another four hours. I sent my fanart via the diorama category so that it is at least in the system if you don't get the problem fixed, but it would be nice if we could have just submitted here on the LeagueOfLegends website instead of using a Facebook app that handles like a cow in a shopping trolley.
Crabgot for a prize. Im in.
your telling me that i spent 12 straight hours doing an all nighter and they arent even going to let people see it because THEY think it isn't good enough.... thats just rude
Mine took two days to make, colouring it in almost took 12 hours.. I FEEL YOU BRO!! {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Hey does anyone know why there is only 18 fan art shown?? I'm pretty sure there were way more that entered. I can't seem to find the rest (mine included). Does anyone know why???

It says "short listed". 
They probably chose the ones they think had the best chances of winning lol 
The second one I saw was a cheater's one which is totally unfair.
The fifth one is plagiarized as well - he cropped out the signature. http://san-ru.deviantart.com/art/Pool-Party-Vi-424853917
I messaged the page on fb and sent the link of the original drawing, hopefully they see

Good job all for bringing justice haha
Thought that one looked fishy but couldn't be bothered searching for it.
I knew that 2nd one was familiar, I saw that on google images lol. Honestly... I thought my one was pretty alright... it was hand drawn too. But I agree with you.
so where do we vote?? its the 27th
Maybe Riot is still asleep...

I can't select the 2D art option when submitting via facebook - it's not yet 3pm!!! I entered under diorama - Please can you check the entries in the diorama section for 2D entries? I'm not the only person with this problem it appears...
Ok so how far is to far? I can see some really borderline provocative stuff cleaning up due to the sexual appeal to the male predominant community
I've seen enough Lilypichu videos to know how2draw using crayons, i got this
I've never entered one before , but i think it's time to shine. '' LET IT GO ''
Can we enter more than once? Like I want to submit a diorama and a drawing if I can :)
Yeah you totally can!
can it be a sketch? with no colour? cuz i can draw great, then when i colour... it goes down, down, down...

It can be a sketch, we are looking for fan art of all kinds even Dioramas!

Just make it a really high quality piece!
Where's the voting?!
umm i only just finished my artwork at 2:53 but there was only the diorama section open. i submitted my drawing into the diorama section if thats okay
